flawed_nl_solution:
Richard has scored 84 touchdowns because 14 x 6 = <<14*6=84>>84
To beat the record he must score 90 touchdowns because 89 + 1 = <<90=90>>90
He needs 10 more touchdowns to beat the record because 90 - 84 = <<10=10>>10
He has 2 games left because 16 - 14 = <<16-14=2>>2
He needs to average 5 touchdowns a game to beat the record because 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
